amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report to strike "fair market value" and replace it with "salvage value," which is defined as the value of an asset at the end of its useful life.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures to strike "fair market value" and replace it with "salvage value", which is defined as the value of an asset at the end of its useful life.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 184 (Roll no. 219).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. McCormick.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 184 (Roll no. 219).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
